oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Organic and alike farming in Latin America: state and relevance for small-scale livestock keepers
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Siegmund-Schultze, Marianna
Valle Zárate, Anne
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Production systems
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: While the organic movement is growing, its contribution to small-scale livestock farm-ing in Latin America is contentious. Secondary literature and available statistics were used for this study. Farms and area under certified organic agriculture are rising, but small-scale livestock farming is little represented. The latter is yet to be found in non-certified organic-like farms, offering locally adapted paths to securing livelihoods.
